section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: A ring buffer of Quaternions with a Delta() function that computes the buffer's average change over time as an angle-axis vector. Returns Vector3.zero if the buffer contains one or fewer samples.
The larger the buffer, the more stable but also delayed the resulting average change over time. A buffer size of 5 is a good start for 60-90 Hz updates.
